request.description: Return washing machine information by id, id should always be 1 since there is only 1 washing machine available

Return washing machine statistics since last reset:  
\- Total time switched on (unit: second)  
\- Amount of money earned (unit: cent)

Only return when washing machine is in **maintenance mode** state, else return error message

query parameter:

**job_completed**  
boolean, not required  
set to **true** returns statistics calculated based on **completed** jobs only  
set to false returns statistics calculated based on **incompleted** jobs only  
omitting this parameter returns statistics calculated based on **all** jobs

response.name: Get Washing Machine Statistics - failed

request.description:
To turn on the washing machine, request will only success when washing machine is in **off** state, else return error message

No body parameter

To turn off the washing machine, request will only success when washing machine is **not** in **off** state, else return error message

No body parameter

Will return refundValueCent if washing machine has inserted value when turn off

response.name: Power Off Washing Machine - with refund

request.description:
To open washing machine door, request will only success when washing machine door is **closed** and there is no ongoing job, else return error message

No body parameter

response.name: Open Washing Machine Door - failed due to door open

request.description:
To close washing machine door, request will only success when washing machine door is **open**, else return error message

No body parameter
To select wash type when washing machine is in **idle** state, and wash_type must be one of the available wash type retrieve from Get Available Wash Types endpoint, else return error message

To increase inserted value when washing machine is in **wash type selected** state, and coin_value_cent must be one of the available coin type retrieve from Get Accepted Coin Types endpoint, else return error message

response.name: Insert Coin - failed due to value
Insert Coin - failed due to state

request.description:
To start wash job when washing machine is in **pending start** state, and door must be **closed**, else return error message  
No body parameter  
Return refundValueCent if inserted value is more than required value

response.name: Start Wash - failed due to door open

request.description:
To cancel wash job when washing machine is in **wash type selected / pending start / pending continue** state, else return error message  
No body parameter  
Will return refundValueCent if washing machine has inserted value when cancel job

response.name: Cancel Wash - failed

request.description:
To cancel wash job when washing machine is in **pending continue** state, else return error message  
No body parameter

response.name: Continue Wash - failed

request.description:
To enter maintenance mode when washing machine is in **idle** state, else return error message  
No body parameter

To enter maintenance mode when washing machine is in **maintenance mode** state, else return error message  
No body parameter

response.name: Exit Maintenance Mode - failed

request.description:
To reset statistics when washing machine is in **maintenance mode** state, else return error message  
No body parameter

response.name: Reset Statistics - failed

request.description: Returns all accepted coin types, no query parameter for this endpoint
Returns all available wash types, no query parameter for this endpoint
